## Describe the bug / 描述问题
A clear description of what the bug is.
清晰描述遇到的问题。

## To Reproduce / 复现步骤
1. Build command / 构建命令: `...`
2. Run command / 运行命令: `...`
3. Error message / 错误信息: `...`

## Expected behavior / 预期行为
What you expected to happen.
你期望发生什么。

## Environment / 环境信息
- OS: [e.g., Ubuntu 24.04, WSL2]
- Docker version: [e.g., 29.1.5]
- GPU: [e.g., RTX 4060 Laptop]
- Driver version: [e.g., 591.86]
- Image tag: [e.g., v0.6-base]

## Additional context / 其他信息
Any other context about the problem.
其他相关信息。
